DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate pharmacokinetics, pharmacodynamics, safety and tolerability of atorvastatin in children and adolescents with heterozygous familial hypercholesterolemia
DOC.brief_title: 8-Week PK/PD Atorvastatin Study In Children And Adolescents With Heterozygous Familial Hypercholesterolemia
DOC.criteria: Genetically confirmed heterozygous familial hypercholesterolemia (HeFH) with LDL greater or equal 4 mmol/L at baseline Evidence or history of clinically significant diseases, homozygous familial hypercholesterolemia (FH)
